purpose: Provide resources and practical implementations for developing intelligent applications across multiple domains using large language models.
principle: Builds on large language models for deployment, inference, and training, offering practical examples and resources.
reusability: Includes example projects and code that can be adapted for different applications. Open source with MIT license for easy integration.
limitations: Primarily focused on educational purposes; may not be suitable for production use without further development.
name: llm-dev
description: 《大模型项目实战：多领域智能应用开发》配套资源
